headline: Mizuho Lowers Fiserv (FI) Price Target, Keeps Outperform Rating
summary: Fiserv, Inc. (NYSE:FI) is one of the 11 Best Fintech Stocks to Buy Right Now. On June 17, Mizuho reduced its price target for Fiserv, Inc. (NYSE:FI) from $200 to $194 while keeping an “Outperform” rating. This downward adjustment in the price target is due to the research firm’s lowered expectations for Fiserv, Inc.’s (NYSE:FI) […]
